name: Whiskey Barrel Aged Roasted Coffee Beans
description:
High-quality coffee beans are chosen and placed in used whiskey barrels, allowing them to absorb the residual flavors and aromas. This aging process can last from a few weeks to several months, depending on the desired intensity of flavor.

Throughout the aging process, the beans are regularly monitored for flavor development and moisture content to ensure optimal aging without spoilage.

After aging, the beans are roasted. The roasting process further enhances the whiskey notes and balances the coffee’s natural flavors.

FLAVOR NOTES: 

The flavor notes of coffee are winy,fruity,slight mixed berries, tropical fruits and ceralic
